entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
